Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Wakeforest Drive, east of the Obidian Housing Complex.
Room.LongDescription: The Obidian Community Housing Complex houses most of the citizens of Oceancrest in relatively spacious accomodations for a relatively inexpensive cost. One of the two major housing complexes in Oceancrest, nearly one third of the entire population lives in these complexes, which are capable of housing over ten thousand people.
